attributes.action: bring back the death penalty for all child killers
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: bring back the death penalty for all child killers who kill children through the act of violence and sexual abuse

rejection.details: This petition overlaps with several already in existence - http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/DeathPenalty1/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
